name: vsts-assemblyinfo-task
description: Extension for Azure DevOps Services that sets assembly information from a build.

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:netcore
scripts.test:netcore: npm run app:netcore && mocha src/netcore/tests/_suite.js --reporter xunit --reporter-option output=ResultsFile.xml
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules dist src/netcore/node_modules src/netframework/node_modules && npm cache verify
scripts.build: npm run clean:tasks && npm run compile:tasks
scripts.build:dev:clean: npm run initdev && npm run build
scripts.build:prod:clean: npm run initprod && npm run build
scripts.initdev: npm run initdev:base && npm run initdev:tasks
scripts.initprod: npm run initprod:base && npm run initprod:tasks
scripts.package: npm run build:clean && npm run package:tasks:production && npm run generate_notice
scripts.package:tasks:test: tfx extension create --root . --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --share-with bleddynrichards

author: Bleddyn Richards
